IGenomeDecoder
public interface
IGenomeDecoder​<TGenome,TPhenome>
where TPhenome : IDisposable
NeatGenomeDecoderAcyclic
NeatGenomeDecoderCyclic

Represents types that decode genomes into phenomes.

Type Parameters
TGenome

The genome type to be decoded.

TPhenome

The phenome type that is decoded to.

Functions
Decode
TPhenome Decode(
TGenome genome
)

Decodes a genome into a phenome.

Note that not all genomes have to decode successfully. That is, we support genetic representations that may produce non-viable offspring. In such cases this method is allowed to return a null.

Parameter
genome
TGenome

The genome to decode.

Returns

A phenome if the genome was valid and therefore decoded successfully; otherwise null.
